data.title: Ricky J Rael Obituary 2023
data.meta_description: Ricky Jesus Rael, 64 of Vaughn, NM passed away at his home Thursday, November 02, 2023. He was born February 15, 1959 the son of Augustin and Esmeralda (Rodarte) Rael. Ricky gre...
data.text:
Ricky Jesus Rael, 64 of Vaughn, NM passed away at his home Thursday, November 02, 2023. He was born February 15, 1959 the son of Augustin and Esmeralda (Rodarte) Rael. Ricky grew up in Vaughn and attended Vaughn Public Schools.

Ricky moved to Phoenix, AZ for 20 years, he worked as a carpenter in the home building construction business. He returned to NM and worked building construction in Albuquerque before returning to Vaughn four years ago. He worked the past four years as maintenance for Oak Tree Inn, Lalo's Food Mart, and Allsups.

According to Ricky's family, he enjoyed listening to music, watching T.V., doing odd jobs for family and friends, and keeping his pickup clean and detailed. Ricky also enjoyed having a cold Budwiser with his family and friends.

Ricky is preceded in death by his parents, one sister Julia Rael, and three brothers, Alex Rael, Kelly Rael, and Ray Rael.

Survivors include one son Mark Lopez, 7 siblings, four sisters, Helen Martinez (Rudy) of Vaughn, Yvonne Zamora (Pete) of Vaughn, Henrietta Garcia (Ernie) of Encino, Gloria Madrid (Norman) of Vaughn, three brothers Johnny Rael (Virginia) of Edgewood, Archie Rael (Alephia) of Vaughn, and Patrick Rael (Audrey) of Albuquerque, and a sister in law, Linda Rael.
